title: Geo Shape
description: The geographic shape of a place. Based on [schema.org](http://schema.org/GeoShape).

_id.title: Shape ID
_id.description: The unique identifier of the shape.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of what the shape is defining.

polygon.title: Polygon
polygon.description: A series of four or more coordinates where the first and final coordinates are identical. In schema.org, this is a plain text. In XDM, it is a structured array instead.

circle.title: Circle
circle.description: A circular region with a specific radius centered on a geographic coordinate.

box.title: Box
box.description: The area enclosed by the rectangle formed by two coordinates. The first coordinate is the lower corner and the second coordinate is the upper corner of a rectangle.

elevation.title: Elevation
elevation.description: The specific or minimum elevation of the shape. This value conforms to the [WGS84](http://gisgeography.com/wgs84-world-geodetic-system/) datum and is measured in meters. In combination with `ceiling`, this property can be used to express a three-dimensional bounding box for a location.

ceiling.title: Ceiling
ceiling.description: The maximum elevation of the shape. Only valid when used in combination with `elevation`. This value conforms to the [WGS84](http://gisgeography.com/wgs84-world-geodetic-system/) datum and is measured in meters. This value is not part of the schema.org spec. In combination with `elevation`, this property can be used to express a three-dimensional bounding box for a location.
